title: BL1 - Insertion Frame for Large Box PCs - duagon
content: The 19" insertion frame is an accessory for duagon's box PCs BL51E and BL50S. Using the frame, the box PCs can be inserted into a 19" cabinet. Having a width of 483 mm, a height of 66 mm and a depth of 237 mm, the frame fits standard 19" dimensions.
The frame is shipped together with two special heat sinks which have to be installed at the sides of the box PC to ensure cooling in the 19" system.

The box PCs to be fitted into the frame can be equipped with a multitude of AMD and Intel multi-core processor architectures. Depending on the application, flexible interface configurations are possible: 2 and more DisplayPorts meet the graphics requirements of the application. Wireless functions such as GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, WLAN, UMTS, GSM, HSDPA, EDGE, LTE are implemented using PCI Express Mini Cards and up to 8 SIM cards. For industrial applications CAN and other fieldbus interfaces are also available. Ethernet, USB and UARTs complement the I/O range.
